Package io.ryos.rhino.sdk.dsl.impl

Class DslBuilderImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • io.ryos.rhino.sdk.dsl.impl.AbstractDSLItem
      • io.ryos.rhino.sdk.dsl.impl.DslBuilderImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AssertionDsl, DslBuilder, DslItem, IterableDsl, MappableDsl, MaterializableDsl, MaterializableDslItem, MeasureDsl, SessionDsl
    public class DslBuilderImpl
extends AbstractDSLItem
implements DslBuilder
    Load DSL implementation, that is the container DSL instance to bind other DSL items.
    Author:
    Erhan Bagdemir
